Restaurant Review

The Savoury Spoon

Address: 225 Wellington St W Second Floor, Toronto, ON

Rating: *****

Nestled in the heart of downtown, The Savory Spoon is a cozy, locally-loved spot that brings a gourmet twist to comfort food. With an inviting ambiance of warm lighting and rustic-meets-modern decor, itâ€™s the perfect setting for a relaxed meal with friends or family. The restaurant takes pride in sourcing fresh, local ingredients, which shine through in their menu. Favorites include the decadent Truffle Mac & Cheese, a creamy, savory dish with just the right hint of earthy truffle flavor, and their Grilled Salmon Salad, which combines perfectly cooked salmon with crisp greens and seasonal vegetables. For dessert, the Molten Lava Cake is a standout, delivering rich, gooey chocolatey goodness alongside a scoop of house-made vanilla bean ice cream. The Savory Spoon excels at providing an elevated yet comforting dining experience that satisfies on every level.

Reviewed on 11/13/2024
